description: Sorting number assigned by original data manager
Date of specimen collection (ISO 8601 format in UTC-10 Tahiti Time)
Date of specimen observation (ISO 8601 format in UTC-10 Tahiti Time)
Number written on entered data sheet
Row of coral in experimental array (1-3)
Column of coral in experimental array (1-9)
Sub-reef identifier within experimental site
Identity of coral colony sampled (format: SITE-POC## e.g. FE-POC01)
Site of observation
Broad classification of observed organism (e.g. snail shrimp fish crab worm)
Species code - first two letters of genus and species combined (e.g. TRSE for Trapezia serenei)
Number of observed organisms within a given size class
Size measurement of organism in millimeters
Finest resolution of taxonomic identification for observed organism
Lowest taxonomic level identified for organism (species genus family etc.)
Alternative size measurement of observed organism in millimeters
Method used to acquire measurement (macro micro etc.)
Corresponding photograph filename with photo of organism and scale bar
General notes from field or about file merging
Identification number from World Register of Marine Species (WoRMS AphiaID)
Phylum of observed organism (blank if not known)
Subphylum of observed organism (blank if not known)
Superclass of observed organism (blank if not known)
Class of observed organism (blank if not known)
Subclass of observed organism (blank if not known)
Superorder of observed organism (blank if not known)
Order of observed organism (blank if not known)
Suborder of observed organism (blank if not known)
Infraorder of observed organism (blank if not known)
Superfamily of observed organism (blank if not known)
Family of observed organism (blank if not known)
Subfamily of observed organism (blank if not known)
Genus of observed organism (blank if not known)
Species of observed organism (blank if not known)
